comment.body:
> [set](#comment_1_1NpaQyMLjikY9FXdfyG4p8CNmS2YrupsRR): How do I create a blank Zeronet page like 127.0.0.1:43110/1DPXmuvtAy9b98j3qWDsE1W8HBK9piZ1bY/ ??

You need to use the alternative method, creating your own site with the python command, and then you can copy the HTML and CSS from that site into your own and edit it.
